description: The Tupolev Tu-14T is a torpedo bomber. It is a development of the Tu-14 medium bomber. The NATO reporting name for the aircraft is Bosun.
notes: Bomb system is ballistic (-1) if doing level bombing from four or more altitude levels above the target.

Tail Guns. In addition to its fixed guns, there aircraft has a tail mount with two 23 mm NR-23 guns that can fire into the 60- arc. These guns may return fire twice per game turn in response to gun attacks or conduct one attack. The hit roll is 3/2/1 and no modifiers apply except target size. The AtA damage rating is 4. The ammunition is 6.0.
The tail gunner does not have an ejection seat and can only bail out.
loadnotes: Station 1 is the internal bomb bay. Load options are: (a) two FAB-1000 2,200 lb bombs, (b) four FAB-500 1,100 lb bombs, (c) six FAB-250 550 lb bombs, (d) sixteen FAB-100 225 lb bombs, or (e) two anti-ship torpedoes. Any bombs carried must be low-drag.
Torpedoes can only be launched from T-level at a speed of 2.5 or less. Both may be launched at once.
